member.name: T:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.BasicGeoposition
member.summary: The basic information to describe a geographic position.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.BasicGeoposition.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude of the geographic position. The valid range of latitude values is from -90.0 to 90.0 degrees.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.BasicGeoposition.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude of the geographic position. The valid range of longitude values is from -180.0 to 180.0 degrees.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.BasicGeoposition.Altitude
member.summary: The altitude of the geographic position in meters.

member.name: M:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.BasicGeoposition.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.
member.param: The latitude of the geographic position.
The longitude of the geographic position.
The altitude of the geographic position.

member.summary: Defines a collection of extensions for the PositionStatus enum.

member.summary: Gets or sets the longitude in degrees. The valid range of values is from -180.0 to 180.0.

member.summary: Gets or sets the altitude of the location, in meters.

member.summary: Gets or sets the accuracy of the location in meters.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.Geocoordinate.Heading
member.summary: Gets or sets the current heading in degrees relative to true north.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.Geocoordinate.Speed
member.summary: Gets or sets the speed in meters per second.

member.summary: Gets or sets the system time at which the location was determined.

member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the Geocoordinate.

member.name: T:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator
member.summary: Provides access to the current geographic location.

member.name: E:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.PositionChanged
member.summary: Raised when the location is updated.

member.name: E:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.StatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the ability of the Geolocator to provide updated location changes.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.DesiredAccuracy
member.summary: Gets or sets the accuracy level at which the Geolocator provides location updates.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.MovementThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the distance of movement, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last PositionChanged event, that is required for the Geolocator to raise a PositionChanged event.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.ReportInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the requested minimum time interval between location updates, in milliseconds. If your application requires updates infrequently, set this value so that location services can conserve power by calculating location only when needed.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.LocationStatus
member.summary: Gets the status that indicates the ability of the Geolocator to provide location updates.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.LastKnownPosition
member.summary: Gets the last known position recorded by the Geolocator.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.DesiredAccuracyInMeters
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired accuracy in meters for data returned from the location service.

member.name: M:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.RequestAccessAsync
member.summary: Requests permission to access location data.
member.returns: A GeolocationAccessStatus that indicates if permission to location data has been granted.

member.name: M:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.GetGeopositionAsync
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous operation to retrieve the current location of the device.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation that, upon completion, returns a Geoposition marking the found location.

member.name: M:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IGeolocator.GetGeopositionAsync(System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous operation to retrieve the current location of the device.
member.param: The maximum acceptable age of cached location data.
member.returns: An asynchronous operation that, upon completion, returns a Geoposition marking the found location.

member.name: T:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IStatusChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information for the StatusChanged event.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.IStatusChangedEventArgs.Status
member.summary: Gets the updated status of the Geolocator object.

member.name: T:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionAccuracy
member.summary: Indicates the requested accuracy level for the location data that the application uses.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionAccuracy.Default
member.summary: Optimize for power, performance, and other cost considerations.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionAccuracy.High
member.summary: Deliver the most accurate report possible. This includes using services that might charge money, or consuming higher levels of battery power or connection bandwidth. An accuracy level of High may degrade system performance and should be used only when necessary.

member.name: T:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the PositionChanged event.

member.name: M:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionChangedEventArgs.#ctor(XPlat.Device.Geolocation.Geoposition)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The location data associated with the PositionChanged event.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionChangedEventArgs.Position
member.summary: Gets the location data associated with the PositionChanged event.

member.name: T:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus
member.summary: Indicates the ability of the Geolocator object to provide location data.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus.Ready
member.summary: Location data is available.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus.Initializing
member.summary: Location services is initializing. This is the status if a GPS is the source of location data and the GPS receiver does not yet have the required number of satellites in view to obtain an accurate position.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus.NoData
member.summary: No location data is available from any source. LocationStatus will have this value if the application calls GetGeopositionAsync or registers an event handler for the PositionChanged event, before data is available from a location sensor. Once data is available LocationStatus transitions to the Ready state.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus.Disabled
member.summary: Location settings are turned off. This status indicates that the user has not granted the application permission to access location.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus.NotInitialized
member.summary: An operation to retrieve location has not yet been initialized. LocationStatus will have this value if the application has not yet called GetGeopositionAsync or registered an event handler for the PositionChanged event. LocationStatus may also have this value if your app doesn't have permission to access location. Call the RequestAccessAsync before accessing the user's location. At that time, your app must be in the foreground and RequestAccessAsync must be called from the UI thread. Until the user grants your app permission to their location, your app can't access location data.

member.name: F:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus.NotAvailable
member.summary: Location services is not available.

member.name: T:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.StatusChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information for the StatusChanged event.

member.name: M:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.StatusChangedEventArgs.#ctor(XPlat.Device.Geolocation.PositionStatus)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:XPlat.Device.Geolocation.StatusChangedEventArgs.Status
member.summary: Gets the updated status of the Geolocator object.
